long_desc: The Grand Mistress of Magic is sitting here.
flags_raw: She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and
stats1_raw: pretty for one of such stature in the guild, no doubt she has kept her
stats2_raw: youthful appearance through the use of strong magics.
stats3_raw: The Grand Mistress pets her familiar and smiles at you in confidence.
